participant_1.background:
I like to read fairytales on the weekends because they are a great escape from the stresses of everyday life.
i work for a clothes retailer.
i have a family of three daughters.
My first cup of coffee in the morning inspires me to write and create content for my blog.
I am a software engineer who works remotely, so I can live in a big city and still take care of my parents in my hometown.

participant_2.background:
I'm an actress, and I'm not giving up on my dream.
i enjoy going to museums.
I want to find a job in marketing that is enjoyable and pays well.
I have been enjoying watching my children grow and learn.
i have never been out of the country.

content.text: I'm currently reading a fairytale. It's a great escape from the stress of everyday life.
I've never really read any fairytales. I'm more into sci-fi and fantasy books.
What kind of sci-fi or fantasy books do you like?
I like books that are set in different worlds, with interesting characters and plots.
I like books that make me think about the world in a different way.
Have you read any books by Ursula K. Le Guin?
I haven't, but I've heard good things about her books.
She's one of my favorite authors. Her books are really thought-provoking.
I'll have to check her out.
You won't regret it.
Thanks for the recommendation.
No problem. What do you do for work?
I'm a software engineer.
That sounds interesting. I'm an actress.
Really? That's awesome. I've always wanted to be an actor.
It's a lot of fun, but it can be hard to make a living.
I can imagine.
What's your favorite thing about your job?
I like the challenge of solving problems and creating new things.
That's a good answer.
What's your favorite thing about your job?
I love getting to play different characters and tell stories
